metadata.name: LGN #39
metadata.description:
The Lion Girl (TLG) is 10,000 plus unique NFT collections. "The Lion Girl in the System" is a one-of-a-kind digital artwork created by renowned artist Lisa Smith, as a unique Non-Fungible Token (NFT) on the Polygon and Ethereum blockchains.

This mesmerizing piece is a blend of vibrant colors and distorted lines, showcasing the beauty of The Lion Girl in the digital world. The artwork features an abstract composition that evokes the sensation of a virtual reality experience, with a dynamic interplay of sharp edges and fluid forms. The vibrant colors in the piece create a hypnotic effect that draws the viewer's eye into a world of digital wonder.

As an NFT, "The Lion Girl (TLG) in the System" is an exclusive and rare piece of digital art, with only one version in existence. It has been authenticated on the blockchain, providing a secure and transparent way for art collectors to verify its provenance and ownership.
